ComicInfo.Title: Reicher Castle Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary: Reicher Castle Part 1: Koshka is sent in the new KV-47 tactical battle armor to infiltrate Reicher Castle and stop the launch of an orbiting missile base manned by hyper-intelligent apes. She finds once she gets there, however, that there are lots and lots of apes and the Axis powers speed up their launch time in response to her attack.
ComicInfo.Characters: Goral (cameo),Captain Koshka Rudinova,Lieutenant Liliya Kyselko (cameo),Joe (cameo),Professor Stephen Priapinski,Cyber-Apes,Captain Tokarev (cameo),General Rasputin (cameo),Colonel Kang (cameo),Markus,Major Sigrid von Thaler,Lieutenant Pauline Su (cameo),General Vladimer Kyselko (cameo),General Kalashnikova (cameo)
